Container.Description: Integrated kodi-headless and mariadb container[br] To use [br]fill in the folder mappings and port settings below [br] 3306 is mariadb port[br]start the container[br] let it run for a couple of minutes[br] and then stop/start it[br] go to unraid terminal and issue this command[br] docker exec Koma createuser kodi kodi [br] restart container
